channel.title: How to keep uptime 100%?
channel.description:
Without a dedicated server, is this possible?
I use an auto restarter for every 30 minutes, and mopar checks at 30 minute intervals. Usually this isnt a problem, though even if my server has been on 24/7 the server uptime might be around 50% because of the mopar IP somehow disconnecting or what not.
Anyone help?

item.title: How to keep uptime 100%?
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

you dont NEED to find a VPS

and not all VPS’s cost money.

You can find people that purchased old VPS’s, and still have alicense, but no use for them, letting others use it for free.

Read full topic

item.title: How to keep uptime 100%?
item.dc:creator: @Lord_of_fallen_Angel Lord of fallen Angels
item.description:
@Lord_of_fallen_Angel wrote:

You need a VPS (Virtual Private-Server), or a Dedicated. Both of them will keep the Server’s uptime %99.99. However, each one costs money, and it’s hard to find a website that has the right one.

Read full topic

item.title: How to keep uptime 100%?
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

Dynasty isnt easy to ‘fix’ at all.
Even converting to an event manager wouldnt help that terrible shit.

Delta’s pretty easy if you know what you’re doing.

Read full topic

item.title: How to keep uptime 100%?

item.description:
@i0b_0n wrote:

Dynasty is easy to fix. same as delta and other servers.

Read full topic

item.title: How to keep uptime 100%?
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

Lmao, delta has one of the worst stabilities of ALL sources

Shard > Emulous > iClarity > Delta > Dynasty ( based off one of the afformentioned, just with like… 800 extra process() lines )

Read full topic

item.title: How to keep uptime 100%?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

lol deltas ok on stability idk what your talking about unless you can’t fix the anti-leech

item.title: How to keep uptime 100%?
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

you will need to code differently then or have you even tried it ?

If he’s describing this correctly, then it has absolutely NOTHING to do with his ‘coding’ (lul at that word)

Its a No-IP / Hosting error.

However, if you’re describing this ineadequately, it could just be that your stability blows dick

May I reccomend.
Shard
Emulous

Never Use
Delta
Dynasty

Read full topic

server can stay up 100% and 100% with mopar
you will need to code differently then or have you even tried it ?
